 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סַד‎</span> **noun [masculine]** ==stocks==, for confining feet of culprits (probably loan-word from Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎סַדָּא‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סַדָּנָא‎</span> <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סַד‎</span>, plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סַדִּין‎</span>); = Latin <abbr title="transliteration"><u>nervus</u></abbr>, Greek <span class="bdbLangGreek">ποδοκάκη</span>; — absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רַגְלַיִם‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׂים בַּמּ‎</span> [[Job.13.27|Job 13:27]] ([[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">κώλύμα</span>), [[Job.33.11|Job 33:11]] ([[BDB#Syr|ᵑ6]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">ξύλό</span>); (compare synonym <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַהְפֶּכֶת‎</span>, and Greek equivalent there cited).
